title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 321.11 - Allocation of costs between gas plant and operating expenses to be made currently
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 321.11 - Allocation of costs between gas plant and operating expenses to be made currently

State Regulations

Each utility shall determine currently the cost which are
applicable to the gas plant accounts and in the case of costs involving
allocations, the amount which is applicable to other accounts, such as
operating expenses, taxes, depreciation reserve (cost of plant removal), other
balance sheet accounts, and income or surplus accounts; the intent of this
provision being that such costs shall be allocated to the accounts to which
they are applicable when they are incurred. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
321.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
